phrs.translation: 化学发光指示剂, 翻译
化学发光免疫测定, 化学发光免疫分析法, 化学发光免疫法
化学发光酶免疫测定, 免疫分析, 化学发光酶免疫法, 化学发光酶免疫分析
加热式化学发光检测器
发光底物, 化学发光底物, 增强化学发光

sentences.sentence: CLIA using acridinium ester derivatives as chemiluminescent label has advantages of low background and high signal-to-noise ratio.
sentences.translation: 以吖啶酯衍生物为发光标记物的CLIA的特点是：自然本底低和信噪比高。

sentences.sentence: A new method for determining activities of nitric oxide synthase (NOS) was set by using chemiluminescent assay.
sentences.translation: 利用化学发光分析技术建立一种新的一氧化氮合成酶(NOS)活性测定方法。

sentences.sentence: To study the chemiluminescent assay and inhibitory test in detection of oxygen free radical (OFR) in antral mucosa.
sentences.translation: 探讨用化学发光法测定胃粘膜氧自由基（OFR） 及用抑制试验进行分类。
